Name: [CP] Easier Farm Totem and Survival Burger
Author: LenneDalben
Description: Craft the farm totem with Foraging skill 3, 20 fiber, 10 wood, and 1 red mushroom (or 10 stone), instead of Foraging skill 8, 20 fiber, 1 hardwood, and 1 honey. Also optionally reverts Survival Burger foraging skill level requirement to 2.
